label.intro:
Course Evaluation

We are dedicated to creating excellent distance learning courses. Your responses to the following questions will help us improve course design, instruction, and the type of services we are able to offer online participants.

We appreciate your filling out this short survey. Most questions require only that you click on an answer, but there is also room for your comments at the end.

Please follow the link below to provide feedback on this course.
